EmailTemplate.description: Created by Whitney Downer, 2/28/12. This email is sent following the webinar to thank them for joining as well as direct them to additional resources.
EmailTemplate.name: 30Mar12Web: Boomer Summit.Thank you attending
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You for Attending The ROI in You!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
Thank you for attending our webinar, {{my.title:default=edit me}} on {{my.date:default=edit me}}. I hope you found it informative and relevant. You can find a copy of the presentation slides here and see the recorded webinar by clicking here <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/The_ROI_in_You_3.30.12_FINAL.pdf>.
In addition, we encourage you to take our quiz to uncover whether you are ready to go solo. If you would like to read the stories of current Boomer Independents, please visit our Meet the Independents <http://info.mbopartners.com/are-you-ready-to-go-solo-quiz.html> site.
I am also proud to provide you with a copy of our Boomer study <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Boomer_Report_Final.pdf> that was released today.
Make sure to join the rest of our webinar series by signing up <http://info.mbopartners.com/2012SeriesSignUp.html> for more information.
Regards,
Gene
